nasahistory1904525707356565716.content: Help us wish a very happy birthday 97th to Astronaut Jim Lovell While training for the launch of Apollo 13 #OTD in 1970, Lovell shared some cake with his co-workers on his 42nd birthday. Lovell launched on the near-disastrous Apollo 13 mission a few weeks later.
nasahistory1904525707356565716.author: nasahistory

nasahistory1896576302917775531.content: Cheers to 110 years! NASA’s predecessor, the National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics (NACA), was founded by Congress #OTD in 1915. Celebrate its transformative achievements in flight technology with our new video series:
